articles.author: Seb Starcevic
articles.title: Fists fly as mass brawl erupts in Serbia’s parliament - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Footage of the incident shows MPs shouting, shoving, slapping and throwing water on each other.
articles.content:
Two ministers have resigned and a dozen people have been arrested over the disaster, which critics allege was the result of corruption and a lack of transparency around infrastructure projects. 
Rad… [+1215 chars]
